name: Arkarus
description: Arkarus developed by Firebomb studio team which based in Thailand. We was listing our AKS token on pancake swap on 26 FEB 2022 and official open our game on our Website on 2 MAR 2022. We use Unity to create our game platform and oriented Blockchain and NFT for player to exchange their in game asset and turn it into profit. Arkarus has countless adventures and opportunities await, the galaxy where robots endlessly clash their spirit of steel with others. With the Strategy idle gameplay and endless of team combination, player can use the imagination to create their our army to conquer the galaxy
